1.title: Fire
1.plot: Fire is one of the hottest, young promoters in New York City. However, can he take the heat when all hell breaks loose at a new club? What transpires puts his relationship with socialite, Zen Richards, in jeopardy.

2.title: Dia
2.plot: After discovering her long time boyfriend and up and coming hip hop producer, DJ Billz in a compromising position, Dia Martinez explores a new option with basketball star Langston Williams.

3.title: Ally
3.plot: When she's not juggling customers at the bar, Ally Donovan is managing her career as a singer/songwriter. However, a life or death situation at her job may put both gigs in jeopardy.

4.title: Jalina
4.plot: There's something about Jalina Jones that men love, but just can't put their fingers on. Unfortunately, being in the wrong place at the wrong times has her in a predicament where an aggressive club owner has his hands all over her.

5.title: Ryan
5.plot: Ryan Long is the youngest member of a consortium of powerful club and restaurant owners in New York City. He is smart, savvy and dangerous. Beyond the boy next-door appearance is a man with many secrets.

6.title: Cal
6.plot: Cal Martinez is committed to being a good father. However, when his mom discovers the means, he moves into his cousin, Squab's house. When Cal arrives, this good guy is thrown into the mix of Squab's bad lifestyle.

7.title: Zen
7.plot: Zen Richards was the most influential socialite in New York City until her celebrity parents died in a fatal car accident. Her life is turned upside down as she battles old demons and new desires.

locations: New York City, New York, USA::(on location)
imdb.plot outline: When socialite Zen Richards blows through the trust fund left to her by her deceased celebrity parents, she turns to her only remaining friend to help her manage. Fire, New York City's premiere night club promoter, agrees to move in with Zen not only out of the goodness of his heart, but also because he too, is in the midst of a major financial disaster. Even though his events are more popular than ever, a weekly pay out to the silent partners who helped him start his business is bleeding him dry. Knowing that they need an additional stream of income to keep Zen's estate afloat, Fire rents out the first floor apartment, which were previously the servants' quarters. Zen and Fire's new tenants, Ally, Jalina and Cal are all making ends meet working in New York's hottest spots at night while pursuing their true passions during the day. In addition to managing their own drama, they are also privy to the salacious secrets of the rich and famous party goers they serve as well as the grimy underbelly of the nightlife world. The people they encounter and the information they acquire could make or break them.
imdb.title: About That Life
plot: A diverse group of young socialites entrenched in the glamorous and gritty New York City nightlife end up under the same roof. While they all make ends meet working in New York's hottest nightclubs, the drama escalates.::Natalie Hodge

When socialite Zen Richards blows through the trust fund left to her by her deceased celebrity parents, she turns to her only remaining friend to help her manage. Fire, New York City's premiere night club promoter, agrees to move in with Zen not only out of the goodness of his heart, but also because he too, is in the midst of a major financial disaster. Even though his events are more popular than ever, a weekly pay out to the silent partners who helped him start his business is bleeding him dry. Knowing that they need an additional stream of income to keep Zen's estate afloat, Fire rents out the first floor apartment, which were previously the servants' quarters. Zen and Fire's new tenants, Ally, Jalina and Cal are all making ends meet working in New York's hottest spots at night while pursuing their true passions during the day. In addition to managing their own drama, they are also privy to the salacious secrets of the rich and famous party goers they serve as well as the grimy underbelly of the nightlife world. The people they encounter and the information they acquire could make or break them.::Natalie Kay Hodge
